extracted_concepts.definition: The standard conversion rate between gold pieces (gp) and silver pieces (sp).

rule_logic.description_text: One gold piece (gp) is worth ten silver pieces (sp).

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard conversion rate between silver pieces (sp) and copper pieces (cp).

rule_logic.description_text: One silver piece (sp) is worth ten copper pieces (cp).

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard conversion rate between electrum pieces (ep) and silver pieces (sp).

rule_logic.description_text: One electrum piece (ep) is worth five silver pieces (sp).

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard conversion rate between gold pieces (gp) and electrum pieces (ep).

rule_logic.description_text: One gold piece (gp) is worth two electrum pieces (ep).

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard conversion rate between platinum pieces (pp) and gold pieces (gp).

rule_logic.description_text: One platinum piece (pp) is worth ten gold pieces (gp).

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard exchange rate for a Copper Piece (CP) to other coin denominations.

rule_logic.premise: A quantity of Copper Pieces (CP) needs to be converted to another currency type
rule_logic.description_text: 1 copper piece (cp) is worth one-tenth of a silver piece, one-fiftieth of an electrum piece, one-hundredth of a gold piece, or one-thousandth of a platinum piece.
related_search_terms: how much is a cp worth

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard exchange rate for a Silver Piece (SP) to other coin denominations.

rule_logic.premise: A quantity of Silver Pieces (SP) needs to be converted to another currency type
rule_logic.implication: 1 SP = 10 CP, 0.2 EP, 0.1 GP, or 0.01 PP
rule_logic.description_text: 1 silver piece (sp) is worth ten copper pieces, one-fifth of an electrum piece, one-tenth of a gold piece, or one-hundredth of a platinum piece.
related_search_terms: how much is an sp worth

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard exchange rate for an Electrum Piece (EP) to other coin denominations.

rule_logic.premise: A quantity of Electrum Pieces (EP) needs to be converted to another currency type
rule_logic.implication: 1 EP = 50 CP, 5 SP, 0.5 GP, or 0.05 PP
rule_logic.description_text: 1 electrum piece (ep) is worth fifty copper pieces, five silver pieces, one-half of a gold piece, or one-twentieth of a platinum piece.
related_search_terms: how much is an ep worth

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard exchange rate for a Gold Piece (GP) to other coin denominations.

rule_logic.premise: A quantity of Gold Pieces (GP) needs to be converted to another currency type
rule_logic.implication: 1 GP = 100 CP, 10 SP, 2 EP, or 0.1 PP
rule_logic.description_text: 1 gold piece (gp) is worth one hundred copper pieces, ten silver pieces, two electrum pieces, or one-tenth of a platinum piece.
related_search_terms: how much is a gp worth

extracted_concepts.definition: The standard exchange rate for a Platinum Piece (PP) to other coin denominations.

rule_logic.premise: A quantity of Platinum Pieces (PP) needs to be converted to another currency type
rule_logic.implication: 1 PP = 1000 CP, 100 SP, 20 EP, or 10 GP
rule_logic.description_text: 1 platinum piece (pp) is worth one thousand copper pieces, one hundred silver pieces, twenty electrum pieces, or ten gold pieces.
related_search_terms: how much is a pp worth
